pageContext.title: How to be a daddy and still have time for coding
pageContext.content: If you are a young dad as I am and wondering how to find time for both baby care and code this post is addressed straight to you. When my daughter was born 6 months ago I thought that I'll never again find time for home coding and guess what - I was wrong! After 3 months I found my way how to deal with it and would like to share it with you - so let's make a cup of coffee and read!
